item.title: FT Most Read: Sunday, February 16, 2025 at 2:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Ukraine rejects Trump bid to take rights to half its mineral reserves
2. End of an era? Germany in disarray as US scolds staunchest European ally
3. Marco Rubio speaks with Sergei Lavrov ahead of US-Russia talks next week
4. [Opinion] How to understand Elon Musk
5. [Opinion] Forget the US — Europe has successfully put tariffs on itself
item.guid: FT Most Read: Sunday, February 16, 2025 at 2:15 PM UTC
